title: icdConvert - How to Use the Package
text: package can installed github devtools package using following command: might get warning needing Rtools build package, able ignore . can loaded like R package: package contains three primary functions(map_code, get_description, map_describe) dataframe (example_data_icd9_pc). example dataframe character column icd9_pc, list ICD-9 procedure codes. vignette demo primary functions using example_data_icd9_pc.

title: icdConvert - How to Use the Package
text: function takes vector ICD codes converts corresponding ICD version. user must specify destination ICD version (.e. ICD version want convert codes ) type code converted ("dg" diagnosis codes, "pc" procedure codes). package handles one--many mappings codes. match can found, returned destination code string "matches found". mapping performed using General Equivalence Mapping (GEM) files provided CMS. package uses 2018 version GEMs files last year GEMs files updated (see ): stated FY 2016 IPPS/LTCH PPS final rule (80 FR 49388), GEMs updated annual basis part ICD-10 Coordination Maintenance Committee meetings process continue updated approximately 3 years ICD-10 implemented.

title: icdConvert - How to Use the Package
text: function takes list ICD codes gets code descriptions using CMS provided tables. consistency, 2018 version tables used ICD-10.

title: icdConvert - How to Use the Package
text: function combines functionality map_code get_description one. maps codes desired ICD version gets corresponding descriptions mapped codes.
